articles.description:
Kuala Lumpur - Tokyo Olympic silver medallist cyclist Azizulhasni Awang said that he had been given a "second chance" at life after the 34-year-old Malaysian had open-heart surgery.

Azizul will sit out the Commonwealth Games and Asian Games later this year…
